scripts.resetdb: NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config src/db/drop_db.js && NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config src/db/create_db.js
scripts.resetdev: npm run resetdb && npm run dev
scripts.resetdb:test: npm run createdb:test && npm run dropdb:test
scripts.docker:buildpushserver: docker context use default && docker builder use mybuilder && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t signetframework/signet-broker:latest --push .
scripts.docker:buildpushdb: docker context use default && docker builder use mybuilder && cd src/db && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t signetframework/signet-db:latest --push .
scripts.ecs:up: docker context use signetecscontext && docker compose up
scripts.ecs:down: docker context use signetecscontext && docker compose down
scripts.deploy: npm run ecs:createcontext && npm run ecs:up
